title: Authors and Citation
text: Mowinckel (2026). ggsegAicha: AICHA Atlas 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 2.0.0, https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegAicha.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggsegAicha: AICHA Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem},   author = {Athanasia Mo Mowinckel},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 2.0.0},   url = {https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegAicha}, }

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegAicha-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda — Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegAicha
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: AICHA Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: AICHA Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains dataset plotting aicha atlas ggseg ggseg3d. Joliot, M., Jobard, G., Naveau, M., Delcroix, N., Petit, L., Zago, L., … & Tzourio-Mazoyer, N. (2015). AICHA: atlas intrinsic connectivity homotopic areas. Journal neuroscience methods, 254, 46-59. () learn use atlases, please look documentation ggseg ggseg3d

title: AICHA Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggseg r-universe: can install released version ggsegAicha GitHub :   Please note ‘ggsegAicha’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggseg = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggsegAicha') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("ggseg/ggsegAicha") library(ggseg) #> Warning: package 'ggseg' was built under R version 4.1.1 #> Loading required package: ggplot2 library(ggseg3d) library(ggsegAicha)  plot(aicha) +   theme(legend.position = "bottom",          legend.text = element_text(size = 9)) +   guides(fill = guide_legend(ncol = 6)) library(dplyr) ggseg3d(atlas = aicha_3d) %>%    add_glassbrain() %>%    pan_camera("right lateral")

what: AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha
title: AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha
text: Brain atlas AICHA cortical parcellation 342 regions. original volumetric atlas MNI space projected fsaverage using CBIG lab's registration fusion. Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha
AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha
AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha
text: Joliot M, Jobard G, Naveau M, Delcroix N, Petit L, Zago L, ... & Tzourio-Mazoyer N (2015). AICHA: atlas intrinsic connectivity homotopic areas. Journal Neuroscience Methods, 254, 46-59. doi:10.1016/j.jneumeth.2015.07.013

title: AICHA Atlas (Atlas of Intrinsic Connectivity of Homotopic Areas) — aicha

what: ggsegAicha: AICHA Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegAicha-package
title: ggsegAicha: AICHA Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegAicha-package
text: AICHA (Atlas Intrinsic Connectivity Homotopic Areas) atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegAicha: AICHA Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegAicha-package
ggsegAicha 2.0.0
text: aicha now ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 2D 3D data. separate aicha_3d object removed. Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = aicha) 2D plots ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = aicha) 3D plots — object. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
